text: Tartan is a pattern that has criss-crossed horizontal and vertical bands in many different colors. ==Related pages== *Tartan Day, is a day set aside for the celebration of the Scottish influence on North America, Australia and New Zealand, but not celebrated in Scotland itself. It is the anniversary of the Declaration of Arbroath. *Tartanry == Other websites == * Online Tartan Designer Online photorealistic tartan designer * Kilts & Tartan Made Easy , free ebook by Nicholas Fiddes * Scottish Tartans Authority, an industry- supported Scottish charity * Tartan Finder all recorded and woven tartans, search by name or color * Online Tartan Creator * Online Tartan Designer Category:Cloth
title: Tartan
